item.title: Some Thoughts on Code Commenting
item.description: Students regularly ask me about whether they should “comment their code”. Partly this is because they are taught to comment their code when they are learning their first programming language or going through their first programming course. The problem is that we don’t explain why we teach commenting in the way we do, when we should stop commenting in that way, and how our commenting behaviour should evolve as we become more proficient programmers.

item.title: Double Operator Tricks in JS
item.description: Here are two, occasionally useful, Javascript tricks that I recently discovered. They both involve doubling up operators. !!
